title: The Great British Bae Off
description:
Having previously shown love to Nichole’s southern roots, we now skip across the pond to shine the spotlight on some of Bim’s British countrymen. We talk to writer Bridget Minamore about everything from roadmen to posh geeks, and ponder why Americans love a British accent. Plus, Bridget reads a naughty poem about Charlie Cox that might just put this week’s Fanfic Wars to shame...
(We cannot be responsible for any texts you send after listening. Things get hot enough to bake a scone or two.)
We are loving your drabbles, so keep sending ‘em! 

Find show notes, fanfic, and more on our Tumblr.
Follow us on Twitter for thirsty GIFs. Bim is @bimadew and Nichole is @tnwhiskeywoman. Be there for the #ThirstyThursdayGIFParty.
Our music is by Tanya Morgan.
Remember to rate, review and subscribe!  

And another thing! If you would like to take part in Thirst Sommelier in a future episode, please call us and leave us a message on 765-8-THIRST which is 765-884-4778. 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
